data.name: Wing Pro 6 Commercial Use Upgrade
data.detailed_description: Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.  Wing Pro is an integrated development environment designed specifically for the Python programming language. It integrates powerful editing, testing, debugging, and project management features to help reduce development and debugging time, cut down on coding errors, and make it easier to understand and navigate Python code. Wing Pro an be used to develop any kind of Python code for web, GUI, game, embedded scripting, and other applications.
data.about_the_game: Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.  Wing Pro is an integrated development environment designed specifically for the Python programming language. It integrates powerful editing, testing, debugging, and project management features to help reduce development and debugging time, cut down on coding errors, and make it easier to understand and navigate Python code. Wing Pro an be used to develop any kind of Python code for web, GUI, game, embedded scripting, and other applications.
data.short_description: Wing Pro is a Python IDE with powerful debugger and intelligent editor that make interactive Python development fast, accurate, and fun. Purchasing this upgrade gives you the right to use Wing Pro also for commercial (non-hobby) uses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: glibc version 2.15+
  • Processor: x64 Intel (remote debug to x32 Intel and ARM Linux)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
